name: Cofagrigus
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.

abilities.name: Six Feet Under
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack) you may Knock Out this Pokémon. If you do, put 3 damage counters on your opponent’s Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Slap of Misfortune
attacks.effect: Whenever your opponent flips a coin during his or her next turn, treat it as tails.
